root: Predict the ending of Stranger Things final season based on fan theories and cast hints.

predictions.theory: The Stranger Things cast has hinted that the final season will be emotional and possibly heartbreaking, with Noah Schnapp stating it's 'beyond anything we've done yet' and 'the most emotional work we've done'
